about_the_game:
Step into the paws of a clever raccoon in the demo version of Twilight Tails, an exciting survival adventure set in the wild. This demo offers you a unique opportunity to immerse yourself in a world full of mysteries, dangers, and adventures, where every step can mark the beginning of a new challenge.

What awaits you in the demo?

  • Resource Gathering: Find and collect the essential materials needed for survival, helping you build shelters, defend against predators, and maintain your energy throughout your journey.

  • Try out various mechanics: Interact with the environment through a variety of mechanics — gather resources, explore the surroundings, encounter other animals, and adapt to the ever-changing conditions. Each task will help you better understand how to survive and overcome the challenges of the wild.

  • Finding other animals: Hidden within the forests and clearings are other creatures, and your task is to find them. These encounters may lead to new alliances or unexpected confrontations.

  • World Exploration: Discover a beautifully crafted world, full of secrets, unexpected twists, and hidden corners. Every rock and tree may hold something special to aid in your survival.

Why should you try it?

The Twilight Tails demo provides just a glimpse of a vast world filled with scenic landscapes, unpredictable weather conditions, and a dynamic ecosystem. You’ll need to learn not only how to survive but also how to adapt to changing conditions, interact with other forest dwellers, and gradually uncover the secrets of the surrounding world.

Immerse yourself in nature, feel the thrill of real adventure, and begin your journey into the world of Twilight Tails!

name: Twilight Tails Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3470 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960, 4 GB or AMD Radeon RX 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700K or Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6GB or Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: Twilight Tails is an immersive interactive adventure where you step into the role of a raccoon to survive in the mysterious wild. Venture into the unknown, where every bush, tree, and underground realm holds secrets and challenges.
supported_languages: English, German, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Ukrainian
